hero.title: Terms and Conditions
hero.subtitle: Terms governing your use of DocumentoIQ services

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using DocumentoIQ ('Service'), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our Service.

service.title: Description of Service
service.content: DocumentoIQ provides intelligent document processing services using artificial intelligence, including OCR, data extraction, and document analysis. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the Service at any time.

items.responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
items.accuracy: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
items.security: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account
items.liability: You are liable for all activities that occur under your account

items.illegal: Use the Service for any illegal purpose or in violation of any laws
items.harmful: Upload harmful, malicious, or offensive content
items.reverse: Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or extract source code
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
items.unauthorized: Access the Service through unauthorized means
items.commercial: Resell or redistribute the Service without authorization

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of the Service, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the exclusive property of DocumentoIQ and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: By uploading documents, you grant DocumentoIQ a limited license to process, analyze, and store such content solely for the purpose of providing the Service. You retain ownership of your documents and are responsible for ensuring you have the right to upload them.

items.fees: Subscription fees are billed according to your selected plan
items.refunds: Refund policies are specified in your subscription agreement
items.changes: We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days notice

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms. You may cancel your account at any time. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. We do not guarantee uninterrupted, error-free, or secure operation of the Service.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, DOCUMENTOIQ SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold DocumentoIQ harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated via email or platform notification. Continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of modified Terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of [Your Jurisdiction].

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, contact us at:
